solution.text:
Length of pipe, l \(=_{j}_\)cm
Inner radius of pipe, \(r_1=_{{Fraction(k,2)}}_=_{{k/Decimal(2)}}_\)cm
Outer radius of pipe \(r_2=_{{Fraction(l,2)}}_=_{{l/Decimal(2)}}_\)cm
Inner curved surface area \(=2\pi r_1 h\)
\(=2\pi \times _{{k/Decimal(2)}}_ \times _{j}_\)
\(=_{{trunc((2*(pi_val)*(k/Decimal(2))*j),3)}}_cm^2\)

content.text:
A metal pipe of length \(_{j}_\)cm has inner diameter \(_{k}_\)cm and outer diameter \(_{l}_\)cm.
Find the inner curved surface area.
